text: Rogério Dutra Silva was the defending champion but lost in the quarterfinals to Carlos Gómez-Herrera. Marco Cecchinato won the title after defeating Gómez- Herrera 1–6, 6–1, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Challenger ATP Cachantún Cup - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 Challenger ATP Cachantún Cup – Singles
